refnamediv.refpurpose: This function generates root Zadoff-Chu sequence of complex symbols as per LTE specifications.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: SEQ = lteZadoffChuSeq(R, N) generates the Rth root Zadoff-Chu sequence (SEQ) of length N.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: seq1 = lteZadoffChuSeq(2, 3) disp(seq1,'seq1') Error should occur because inputs are not co primes seq2 = lteZadoffChuSeq(25, 5) disp(seq2,'seq2')

refsection.title: Bibliography
refsection.para: 3rd Generation Partnership Project, Technical Specification Group Radio
Access Network, Evolved Universal Terrestrial Radio Access (E-UTRA),
Physical channels and modulation, Release 10, 3GPP TS 36.211, v10.0.0,
